org.jamsim.io

Class FileBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gjt.sp.jedit.buffer.JEditBuffer
      • org.jamsim.io.FileBuffer

  • public class FileBuffer
extends JEditBuffer
    A JEditBuffer that contains the contents of a file. Extends JEditBuffer to load and save a file.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileBuffer

        public FileBuffer()
        Create a FileBuffer without specifying a file.

      • FileBuffer

        public FileBuffer(File file)
           throws IOException
        Create FileBuffer(File) and load the contents of file into it. File is also used later when saving.
        Parameters:
        file - file, or null if no file to be specified yet.
        Throws:
        IOException - if problem reading contents of file.
